price: 93 Mais les hommes se sont ensuite divisés en sectes. C’est à Nous cependant qu’ils feront tous retour sans exception.
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
